name: xinjs-ui
description: simple robust web-components for use with xinjs or anything else

scripts.start: bun pack && bun parcel demo/index.html --https --dist-dir www -p 8787
scripts.pack: bun prebuild && bun test && bun parcel build --public-url . && bun types; bun postbuild
scripts.types: echo 'ignore the error...' && bun tsc ./src/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --target esnext --outDir dist > tsc.log || true
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf www && rm -rf docs && mkdir www docs && bun docs.js && bun icons.js && bun format
scripts.postbuild: cp demo/static/* www && cp demo/static/* docs
scripts.format: bun eslint src demo --fix && bun prettier --write .
scripts.latest: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf node_modules && bun install && npm install

author: Tonio Loewald
